name: Verify that a standard user can mark a normal project as favorite.
description: this test case is to verify that a standard user can mark a project as favorite and it is displayed on the Favorite Projects list.
descriptionHtml: this test case is to verify that a standard user can mark a project as favorite and it is displayed on the Favorite Projects list.
